OOC: That was a component from the alien drive core.  The Soul Orbs 
are completely different, as Rauq or anyone else who paid attention 
can tell you.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Rauq had sent one right down on Tripred base. As for the other 
> one... you'll see soon enough... heheheHeHeHeMwaHaHaHAHAHAHA!!!!!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I'd like to remind everyone that only the characters I listed 
> > will be able to make full use of an Orb's powers.  Others may find 
> > themselves somewhat limited.  (And how would the Soul Orb end up 
in 
> > the Tripred base, or did I read that correctly?)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Vlad was blasted away, swept off from his feet and some distance 
> > from 
> > > Wolfenstein. Slowly, he made it back to his feet.
> > > 
> > > Then he realized how damaged he was. There were some missing 
armor 
> > > over most of his torso, and there was a gash from where a plasma 
> > shot 
> > > had hit him. It took him a lot of will to overcome his damages 
and 
> > > walk to Wolfenstein's side.
> > > 
> > > Vlad: You... You are a good warrior... You have proven yourself 
> with 
> > > the wolf's soul... Here is what I suggest: either you become a 
> > > bondsman to me, or we continue this fight. We both know we are 
> weak. 
> > > What say you?
> > > 
> > > Farther, Tyrael sent a volley of needles that would be more 
> accurate 
> > > on Proto.
> > > 
> > > Then it started. He felt at first Skulletron' input. Images of 
the 
> > two 
> > > predacon brothers, thier grief and hurt. That did not bother 
him. 
> > They 
> > > were mere predacons. They were soldiers that had chosen their 
> paths. 
> > > They were not his troops. Then, there was the Tripredacus and 
> Preds 
> > > living together. That was something else. He knew it was a lost 
> > cause 
> > > to destroy every single predacon, as good as the average 
> Tripredacus 
> > > warrior was. But Megatron, he was the one, he was to be 
destroyed.
> > > 
> > > Then the Orb... It shown images... Incoherent... but promises of 
> > power 
> > > above all. The fusion of two in one... Tyarius, whoever that 
was.
> > > 
> > > Then Tyrael understood. He transformed to phoenix mode and flew 
> > > downward and into the base.
> > > 
> > > There was the Soul Orb. But before, he took something from the 
DNA 
> > > container. He had been a strong warrior, just not skilled enough 
> to 
> > > prevent his death. Now, Tyrael thought, he would have a second 
> > > chance...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Chris Daniels" <dfinnamore@h...> wrote:
> > > > : : Skulletron : :
> > > > 
> > > > Skulletron suddenly shudders, and is distracted from what he 
is 
> > > doing.  The Soul Orb's call strongly enters Skulletron's mind.  
> > After 
> > > struggling to make sense of it, it finally quits taking its toll 
> on 
> > > him.  However, in recieving the call, he also had visions.  
> Visions 
> > of 
> > > the Orbs, visions of Empath, and unexplainable visions.  He 
looks 
> > over 
> > > at Wolfenstein and Tyrael, and then prepares.  He connects his 
> mind 
> > > with Tyrael's mind.  After exploring his mind a little bit, 
> > Skulletron 
> > > gets down to the dirty work.  He starts to send strong images to 
> > > Tyrael's mind.  Pictures of transformers battling mindlessly 
flow 
> > into 
> > > Tyrael's mind.  And then, Skulletron starts to send visions of 
> > > Tyrael's past into Tyrael's mind.  And then, pictures of 
> Wolfenstein 
> > > come in.  Wolfenstein and DrillBit, as young bots, playing like 
> > > brothers do.  Them having good times together as they get older. 
 
> > And 
> > > then, DrillBit's death is shown.  And images of Wolfenstein 
> grieving 
> > > extremely, so much sadness.  Skulletron then begins to bring out 
> the 
> > > voices and images combined.  Multiple voices in Tyrael's mind, 
> > telling 
> > > him that this battle is pointless, telling him that its murder, 
> > > telling him about peace, about sadness, and to make an alliance. 
 
> > The 
> > > voices and images show happiness among the Tripreds and 
Predacons 
> > > together.  All in attempts to sway Tyrael's emotions and 
convince 
> > him 
> > > to call this battle off and join for peace and happiness...
